sentences.en: ...plans that include changes in foreign policy and economic reforms.
sentences.cn: …包括外交政策调整和经济改革的计划。

sentences.en: After all the changes of policy, I'd believe absolutely anything of that man.
sentences.cn: 经过了最近策略的反复更改, 我绝对相信那人什么花样都会使得出来.

sentences.en: Avoid cashing in a policy early as you could lose out heavily.
sentences.cn: 不要提早兑现保单，那样你可能会损失惨重。

sentences.en: Businessmen are displeased with erratic economic policy-making.
sentences.cn: 商界人士对变化无常的经济决策很是恼火。

sentences.en: Buy a policy only from an insurance company that is financially sound.
sentences.cn: 一定要从财务状况良好的保险公司购买保险。

sentences.en: Check that your insurance policy covers breakages and damage during removals.
sentences.cn: 查看一下你的保险单，看其是否对搬运过程中的破损和毁坏赔偿。

sentences.en: Don't make any policy decisions which clash with official company thinking.
sentences.cn: 所作的任何决策都不要和公司官方理念相冲突。

sentences.en: I enclose herewith a copy of the policy.
sentences.cn: 我随信附上一份保险单。

sentences.en: It is advisable to read the small print on your policy.
sentences.cn: 读一下保险单上的附属细则是明智的.

sentences.en: It might be worthwhile to consider your attitude to an insurance policy.
sentences.cn: 考虑一下你对投保的看法也许有所助益。

sentences.en: Premiums are guaranteed throughout the term of the policy.
sentences.cn: 在保单有效期内，所缴纳的保险费是有保障的。

sentences.en: Skiers should be particularly choosy about the insurance policy they buy.
sentences.cn: 滑雪者在选择购买保险的问题上应该尤其慎重。

sentences.en: The insurance policy covers the building and any fixtures contained therein.
sentences.cn: 保险单为这座大楼及其中所有的设施保了险。

sentences.en: the President's chief economic policy wonk
sentences.cn: 总统的首席经济问题策士

words.tran_cn: 监督；管辖；维持治安；为…配备警察

trans.tran_cn: 政策，策略，保险单，策略性
trans.tran_en: a way of doing something that has been officially agreed and chosen by a political party, a business, or another organization
